metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1912 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Dolibarr ERP/CRM3.8.3 allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via the (1) lastname, (2) firstname, (3) email, (4) job, or (5)signature parameter to htdocs/user/card.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1912` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dolibarr - 3.5.8+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.8+dfsg1-1').
